channel.title: Ddspeced: Npc rotation
channel.description:
When ever I try to change the npc rotation on Ddsspeced it doesn't do anything. Anyone know how to fix?
For example "spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 1 HellHound" to: "spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 -1 HellHound" or "spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 2 HellHound"
Thanks

item.title: Ddspeced: Npc rotation
item.dc:creator: @_Dest _Dest_
item.description:
@_Dest wrote:

They can’t rotate, not on any servers that I’ve seen, unless you do something like attack it. Otherwise you have to make it walk a distance.

Read full topic

item.title: Ddspeced: Npc rotation
item.dc:creator: @irlegitir irlegitir
item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

When ever I try to change the npc rotation on Ddsspeced it doesn’t do anything. Anyone know how to fix?

For example
“spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 1 HellHound”
to:
“spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 -1 HellHound”
or
“spawn = 49 2868 9840 0 0 0 0 0 2 HellHound”

Thanks

Read full topic
